original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar had an officer whose name was Nebuzaradan. He was the captain of the king's royal guards. Nebuzaradan came to Jerusalem when Nebuchadnezzar had ruled Babylon for 19 years. It was on the 7th day of the 5th month.
korean_text: 바벨론 왕 느부갓네살의 열아홉째 해 오월 칠일에 바벨론 왕의 신복 시위대장 느부사라단이 예루살렘에 이르러

sentences.original_text: He was the captain of the king's royal guards
when Nebuchadnezzar had ruled Babylon for 19 years
sentences.korean_translation: 느부갓네살이 바빌론을 통치한 지 19년이 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: It was on the 7th day of the 5th month
